e776640d07af7b9f8c804e3bb7f273fb (12:16): hi everyone, is there any way to see which urls have been permanently authorized (pressing allow->remember settings in the security dialog) when using netscape.security.PrivilegeManager.enablePrivilege("UniversalXPConnect") ?
